1 Text: What does a ≡ b (mod n) mean?
2 Text: a and b have same remainder when divided by n.
Greatest Common Divisor. Largest number dividing both a and b.

1 Text: What does Extended Euclidean Algorithm find?
2 Text: x, y such that ax + by = gcd(a,b). Used to compute modular inverses.

1 Text: When does a⁻¹ mod n exist?
2 Text: If and only if gcd(a, n) = 1.
Count of integers < n coprime to n.
